member.name: T:CoViD.GUI.UC.Cartesian.Bitmap
member.summary: Specialize a 'Drawing.Graphics' to interact with a fixed rectangle grid and a given range of x-y values.

member.name: F:CoViD.GUI.UC.Cartesian.Bitmap.X2W
member.summary: Maps a X value (within the given range) to the w (width) value in the drawing grid.

member.summary: Maps a Y value (within the given range) to the h (height) value in the drawing grid.
